CohortIncidence 2.0.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Using CohortIncidence
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

buildOptions()

Builds the BuilderOptions jObject with the specified paramaters

buildQuery()

Builds SQL code to run analyses according given Cohort Characterization design

createCohortRef()

Helper function for creating Cohort References, which are used in different parts of a design to reference a cohort definition and, optionally, to provide a name.

createCohortSubgroup()

Helper function for creating TAR Definitions

createIncidenceAnalysis()

Helper function for creatingIncidenceAnalysis, which encapsulates the target-outcome-timeAtRisk pairs for a given analysis.

createIncidenceDesign()

Creates R object for Incidence Design

createOutcomeDef()

Helper function for creating Outcome Definitions

createStrataSettings()

Helper function for creating strata settings

createTimeAtRiskDef()

Helper function for creating TAR Definitions

executeAnalysis()

Executes IR analysis given a design, options, and connection settings.

getCleanupSql()

Gets the sql that drops the results tables

getResultsDdl()

Gets the results schema DDL for Incidence Analysis

Contents
